carbine.name: AR-SOC C
carbine.effect:
Fires 5.56 x 45 NATO
The carbine variant of the ECSC's modern modular infantry weapon platform is simple, cheap and offers moderate improvements upon it's predecessor in almost every way.

carbine.name: LA75 Bullpup
carbine.effect:
fires 7.62 x 51 NATO
Never jams; if a 1 or 2 is rolled on fire, one round is fired normally, one 
extra round is ejected like a shell casing. Minimum strength 6 to carry.

carbine.name: Type-300
carbine.effect:
fires Argon-10 plasma rounds;
deals 2 x Plasma Burn on hit

carbine.name: MBR-10
carbine.effect:
fires Medium Krypton-10 Charge pack.
deals 2 x Plasma burn tokens on hit

carbine.name: K-BR
carbine.effect:
fires Krypton-12 plasma rounds;
inflicts 2 x Plasma Burn tokens on hit

carbine.name: G-25
carbine.effect:
fires 4.5 x 45 mm Tungsten Core Caseless
inflicts 2x Bleed on hit
A tremendous zap occurs as each bank of capacitors discharges in an instant, accelerating the small projectile to Mach-2 within the barrel. Dual Capacitor banks allow for no recharge time between shots, as there is always a charged set to fire a round.

Integrated Improved Silencer.

shotgun.name: Model 2x12
shotgun.effect:
Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m
Double-Barrel/Break-Barrel. Full action to reload. Each mag pouch in a piece of armor holds 8 shells.

shotgun.name: Hunting Shotgun
shotgun.effect:
Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m.
Slug: 60 dam out to 50m.
Half action to rack. See Basic Rules:actions

shotgun.name: Over/Under
shotgun.effect:
Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m.
Due to the nature of the Over / Under, you can load both Buck and Slug at the 
same time. Both barrels can be fired at the same time, at a +10% miss chance 
penalty. Reload DC 25%, Full Action reload time. Each mag pouch in a peice of armor holds 8 shells.

shotgun.name: MK900
shotgun.effect: Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m.

shotgun.name: Neon AN-12
shotgun.effect:
Capacity:	6 rounds
Buckshot: 120 damage and 2 plasma burn tokens out to 3m,
		90 and 1 plasma burn token out to 10m, 
		60 and 1 plasma burn token out to 20m
Slug: 80 damage and 1 plasma burn token out to 60m
Plasma shells cost $60 each
Pump Action
Reloading only takes a half action, if reload roll is above 80% loads 3 shells,  if roll is below 30%, only loads 1 shell. Loads 2 shells otherwise.

shotgun.name: C-6
shotgun.effect:
This Over-Under shotgun fires special Shotshells which each contain 3 caseless rounds. Loading is as simple as breaking open the barrels and inserting 1 shell into each barrel. Each round must be individually pumped into the rail chamber, leading to a unique break-barrel loaded, pump action firearm.
10% / 15%
2 rds, 3 x 25 mm Tungsten Core Shotshell
60 + 2x bleed.
A tremendous zap occurs as each bank of capacitors discharges in an instant, accelerating the small projectile to Mach-2 within the barrel. Dual Capacitor banks allow for no recharge time between shots, as there is always a charged set to fire a round. Pump Action on every other shot, so 1 half action to fire once, another to fire again, then a half-action to chamber the next two rounds. For an extra $200, the weapon can be purchased as a semi-automatic version, but with 15% miss instead of 10%
Minimum strength 6.

smg.name: DE-22 Ghostbuster
smg.effect:
deals laser damage
Doesn''t jam; when rolling a 1 to reload overheats burning user for 15 damage.

smg.name: K-DS
smg.effect:
fires Krypton-12;
Deals 2 x Plasma Burn tokens on hit
Made for dual-weilding, these SMGs utilize magnetic magazines that can be reloaded without the use of an off-hand. Reload DC 15%
The K-LS features a burst fire mode which allows for 2 round burst. Rather than firing DEX/2 shots per turn, fire 2 shots per half-action.

smg.name: K-35
smg.effect:
fires 3 x 25mm Tungsten Core Caseless
Inflicts 2x bleed on hit.
A tremendous zap occurs as each bank of capacitors discharges in an instant, accelerating the small projectile to Mach-2 within the barrel. Dual Capacitor banks allow for no recharge time between shots, as there is always a charged set to fire a round.

pistol.effect: Target must make a DC 90 Shock check. Failing that roll stuns the target for 3 turns.

automatic rifle.name: AR-SOC L
automatic rifle.effect:
fires 5.56 x 45 NATO
The long-barel assault rifle variant of the ECSC's modern modular infantry weapon platform is slightly pricier than it's carbine cousin, but offers even better performance.

automatic rifle.name: Neon APR-180
automatic rifle.effect: Deals 1 plasma burn token on hit

automatic rifle.name: AR-SOC H
automatic rifle.effect: The heavy variant of the ECSC's modern modular infantry weapon platform is the best in it's class, if a bit on the pricey side. Simple, but effective.

automatic rifle.name: LA85 Bullpup
automatic rifle.effect:
fires 7.62x51 NATO
Inflicts  2 x Bleeding token on hit
Supporting Fire
Minimum strength 7 to carry. 
Never jams; if a 1 or 2 is rolled on fire, one round is fired normally, one 
extra round is ejected like a shell casing.

automatic rifle.name: R-130
automatic rifle.effect:
fires rds, 4.5 x 45 mm Tungsten Core Caseless
inflicts 2 x Bleed on hit
A tremendous zap occurs as each bank of capacitors discharges in an instant, accelerating the small projectile to Mach-2 within the barrel. Dual Capacitor banks allow for no recharge time between shots, as there is always a charged set to fire a round.
The cacophony of electronic discharge, coupled with the intense sensation of swarms of hypersonic rounds flying past intimidates the target. 75% Shock saving throw to move or fire.

automatic rifle.name: R-35
automatic rifle.effect:
fires 4.5 x 45 mm Tungsten Core Caseless
inflicts 2x Bleed on hit
A tremendous zap occurs as each bank of capacitors discharges in an instant, accelerating the small projectile to Mach-2 within the barrel. Dual Capacitor banks allow for no recharge time between shots, as there is always a charged set to fire a round.

heavy weapon.name: XM-545 Minigun
heavy weapon.effect:
Reqires Strength of 7 to carry.
5.45 x 39 mm belt; 
Requires 1 full action of spin-up time.
Supporting Fire. No optics, barrel attachments or extended mags.

heavy weapon.name: Ultralight Autocannon
heavy weapon.effect:
Requires strength 6 to carry.
4 rounds, 20mm vicinity detonating HE rounds.
75 explosive damage, 40 shrapnel 1m adjacent.
Damages vehicles. No optics or barrel attachments.
Clips cost $200 each

heavy weapon.name: AA-29 Personal Flack Cannon
heavy weapon.effect:
Requires strength 6 to carry
180 dam out to 3m, 80 out to 10m, 20 out to 20m.
6 rounds, Deathmetal custom flack rounds
Each shot into a door reduces the DC of kicking down that door by 65. If the DC becomes 0, the door is blown open. No optics or barrel attachments. 0% chance to miss airborne targets.
Clips cost $120 each

heavy weapon.name: Kirpan Antimaterial Rifle
heavy weapon.effect:
Requires 8 strength to carry
1 round, depleted uranium Antimaterial round
Damages vehicles, cannot be suppressed.

heavy weapon.name: ECG-8E Coilgun
heavy weapon.effect:
Requires Strength 6 to carry
fires 12mm Ionized Ultradense Bolts
Instead of taking an accuracy penalty to firing at a target in cover, The Light
Coilgun takes a damage penalty; 10 damage for an opponent in light cover, 20 
damage for an opponent in heavy cover, and an additional 20 for an opponent 
that hunkered down. Cannot fire through multiple layers of cover. Does not 
grant awareness of an enemy you can''t see or hear. Cannot be silenced. 
Subsequent shots on the same turn accrue a stacking 15% chance to miss.

heavy weapon.name: LA-8b Light Autocannon
heavy weapon.effect:
Requires strength 7 to carry.
fires 40mm impact detonating Shaped High Explosive warheads
deals 70 damage within 3m diameter of impact. Beware friendly fire.
Damages Vehicles. No Optics or barrel attatchments.

heavy weapon.name: HLG-50
heavy weapon.effect:
fires 10 x 80 mm Tungsten Core Caseless Belt
inflicts 3x bleed on hit
Minimum strength 9.
A tremendous zap occurs as each bank of capacitors discharges in an instant, accelerating the small projectile to Mach-2 within the barrel. Dual Capacitor banks allow for no recharge time between shots, as there is always a charged set to fire a round.
The cacophony of electronic discharge, coupled with the intense sensation of swarms of hypersonic rounds flying past intimidates the target. 75% Shock saving throw to move or fire.
